Crimes.Crime_Name: Membership in organization committing crimes against humanity
Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Involved: Section F(a) and (c) of the Convention Relating to the Status of Refugees
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Involvement with Salvadoran Air Force during commission of crimes against humanity
Crimes.Legal_Framework: Convention Relating to the Status of Refugees, IRPA
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Evidence of awareness and support for criminal actions
Crimes.Exemptions_or_Defenses_Cited: Economic reasons for remaining in the organization
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Testimonial and documentary evidence of service and knowledge
Crimes.Nature_of_Participation: Knowing participation and support without protest
Crimes.Temporal_Context: Period of civil conflict in El Salvador
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Exclusion based on complicity in crimes against humanity
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Definition of complicity in international law
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: Applicant did not seek protection or resist within the state apparatus
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Association with a state military committing atrocities
Crimes.Credibility: Not challenged; focus on legal consequences of admitted conduct
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Article 1F(a) and (c) of the Refugee Convention
Crimes.State_Protection_Adequacy: Deemed inadequate due to state-perpetrated violence
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Persecution through association with persecuting entity
Crimes.Legal_Basis: International customary law and treaty obligations
Crimes.Victim_Basis: Non-combatants targeted by aerial bombardments and repression

Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Involved: Section F(a) and (c) of the Convention Relating to the Status of Refugees
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Active support and continued service in an organization committing crimes against humanity
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Proof of knowledge and direct support for criminal acts
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Service records, operational knowledge, lack of dissent
Crimes.Nature_of_Participation: Knowing and supportive role without resistance
Crimes.Temporal_Context: Civil war period in El Salvador
Crimes.Personal_Data_Implicated: Military affiliation, duty assignments, personal statements
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: International criminal law definition of complicity
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Exclusion due to complicity in systemic human rights violations
Crimes.Role_of_Person: Supporting member of Salvadoran Air Force
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: No attempt to avail oneself of internal protections
Crimes.Credibility: Conduct acknowledged; legal characterization at issue
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Article 1F(a) and (c) of the Refugee Convention
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Liability for aiding and abetting mass atrocities
Crimes.Legal_Basis: Customary international law, domestic implementation via IRPA
Crimes.Victim_Basis: Civilian population subjected to indiscriminate attacks
